remarks: Decompose a group sum into projections.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ dpjeq as of 14-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
dpjidclOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjidclOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjidclOLD.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjidclOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( G DProd S ) ) $.
dpjidclOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dpjidclOLD.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | ( `' h " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } $.
dpjeqOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> C ) e. W ) $.
dpjeqOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( A = ( G gsum ( x e. I |-> C ) ) <-> A. x e. I ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) = C ) ) $.
$d .0. h x $.
$d A h x $.
$d C h $.
$d G h i x $.
$d I h i x $.
$d P h x $.
$d S h i x $.
$d W x $.
$d h x $.
$d i ph x $.
